Wondrous item, uncommon
Found in a small packet, this powder resembles soft white sand. There is enough of it for one use. When you use an action to throw the dust into the air, you and each creature within 30 feet of you that requires sleep must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or fall unconscious until the sleeper takes damage, someone uses an action to shake or slap the sleeper awake, or 1 minute has passed.
